LanguageData.Proj_GrenadeMolotov.label: molotov cocktail

LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeMolotov.description: Glass bottle filled with flammable liquid, with a burning cloth in the neck. A favorite weapon of hooligans and desperate warriors from rim to rim。
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeMolotov.verbs.0.label: throw molotov
LanguageData.Proj_GrenadeEMP.label: EMP Grenade

LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeEMP.description: Electromagnetic pulse grenade damaging to electronic equipment。
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeEMP.verbs.0.label: throw EMP grenade

LanguageData.Proj_GrenadeFlame.label: 燃烧手榴弹
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeFlame.label: 燃烧手榴弹
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeFlame.description: A condensed mix of plasma materials make for a small but chaos inducing explosion。
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeFlame.verbs.0.label: throw incendiary grenade
LanguageData.Proj_GrenadePlasma.label: 等离子手雷

LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadePlasma.description: A very potent mix of plasma particles make for a small but deadly explosion。
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadePlasma.verbs.0.label: throw plasma grenade
LanguageData.Proj_GrenadeFusion.label: 融合手雷

LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeFusion.description: An improvement over the simple frag grenade, it contains a more potent explosive。
